content: Questionnaire.date says it is "Date last changed", but the "date" search parameter says it searches the "questionnaire publication date". Are those necessarily the same thing? What if a Questionnaire from one FHIR server is stored in a second FHIR server? Should the date get updated?

Questionnaire.date would be date of formal publication, not necessarily when it last changed on the server - which is _lastUpdated. Probably makes sense to clarify the definition on Questionnaire.date
So, the "date" search parameter searches _lastUpdated? That sounds correct, but the expression next to the "date" search parameter is "Questionnaire.date".
I think Questionnaire.date should say "Date last formally published". 'date' searches Questionnaire.date.
